metadata.title: CVE-2020-22284 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the zepif_linkoutput() function of Free Software Foundation lwIP git head version and version 2.1.2 allows attackers to access sensitive information via a crafted 6LoWPAN packet.

criterions.comment: lwip package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
